title: When are kids trick-or-treating this year since Hallowwen falls on a Sunday?
text:
Wilmington and New Hanover County officials we contacted said
trick-or-treat will be on Sunday as far as they know since no one has
made any efforts to change it. City spokeswoman Malissa Talbert said
the city typically doesn't get involved in those types of decisions.
I moved here four years ago from western Pennsylvania, where the
decision about which night trick-or-treat would be held on was always
a hot topic at town council meetings.
